Name: Leafy Hat
LongDescription: Boosts maximum HP. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Turtwig, Grotle, and Torterra.  You can get a Leafy Hat at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: a Lucky Leaf, a Turtwig Card, and a Sprout Rock. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
